headline: MRU
pros: Young fun startup, excellent dedicated staff, hard working.group of people.  Excellent at raising funds.  The CEO and Chairman was terrific and a pleasure to work for.
cons: The founders were way to inexperienced and were full of themselves and their egos.  They actually ended up suing each other.

headline: Casual but disorganized and poorly run atmosphere, until they went bankrupt
pros: Very casual, almost anything-goes atmosphere, casual dress code, not stringent about tardiness, everyone takes coffee breaks, free food and drinks
cons: Very disorganized and poorly managed, high turnover, key staff often not replaced after leaving, low employee morale, low respect for employees, some executives are temperamental and unprofessional
